src/serial/ll-dgr-src/hydrodynamics_f.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Calculate density, density gradient and chemical potential using the updated values of the order parameter distribution function (fbar) after the streaming step. These terms are required for the stress form of the interfacial force in the dual grid D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM.
